member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.Converters.JsonExceptionConverter
member.summary: A converter to correctly serialize exception objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.Converters.JsonExceptionConverter.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If set to true the serializer hides stack trace (i.e. sets the StackTrace to 'HIDDEN').
The namespaces to search for exception types.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.Converters.JsonExceptionConverter.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this can write JSON.

member.summary: Writes the JSON representation of the object.
member.param: The to write to.
The value.
The calling serializer.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.Converters.JsonExceptionConverter.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance can convert the specified object type.
member.param: Type of the object.
member.returns: true if this instance can convert the specified object type; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.Converters.JsonExceptionConverter.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Reads the JSON representation of the object.
member.param: The to read from.
Type of the object.
The existing value of object being read.
The calling serializer.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the result type of a HTTP operation to correctly generate a Swagger definition.
member.remarks: Use , this attribute will be obsolete soon.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerDefaultResponseAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a default response (HTTP 200/204) should be generated from the return type of the operation method (not needed if no response type attributes are available).

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Excludes an action method from the generated Swagger specification.
